item.title: Boz - BBB
item.description: It"s the Taint of the Weeku2122 again, so it"s time for Boz to talk utter bollocks in between your requests. All aboard the Train-Wreck, WOO WOOH!

item.title: Gurt - Radio Awesome
item.description: It"s another show! It"s starting an hour earlier this week, though. It"s the usual Radio Awesome stuff but Clarus may join again! Wait and see!
